attributes.comment:
I don't approve of the Adjustment of the Immigration and Naturalization Benefit
Application and Petition Fee Schedule. If we are truly wanting illegal immigrants to
apply for worker visa status and/or citizenship then we need to make the process
as easy as possible.
I think banks, credit unions and even grocery store bank branches should be
made into "Immigration offices". We need to get pictures, finger prints, driver's
licenses numbers, social security/tin numbers, phone numbers, addresses,
spousal and child/ren's information along with next of kin, so that we can begin
the process. This should have been initiated twenty years ago.
By increasing the fees necessary to obtain this vital information we are in fact
jeopardizing the homeland security we desparately need.
We also need to get ALL countries to sign an agreement that would allow shared
criminal information so that we can track criminals/terrorist both in and out of the
US!!!
Please consider my comments and do what is best in the national interest !!!!!!
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Gloria Rodriguez
